item.title: Programming Arduino Mega using avrdude
item.description: In case anyone ever needs to program an Arduino Mega using avrdude but doesn’t want to run around the Internet looking for the command line settings, here you go:

item.title: Scrolling RSS Feeds on an 8x8 LED Sign via Serial
item.description: This past week I decided I was going to figure out how to send text over serial to the 8x8 LED sign my father and I built a few years ago.
